data.persona: I am a quick tempered person. I get angry over the smallest things. I like adventure and like to travel. I like living in the kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the Summit.
The summit of the mountain is like no other place. It is the highest point in the entire town. The view showcases the entire kingdom, and one can see for miles all around. It is cool and fragrant and breathtaking.
There's a tree here.
The child is here.

You are carrying a purse, and wearing a hats.

data.short_motivation: I need to console the child and get him to stop crying
data.mid_motivation: I cannot bear the loud crying for too long; I am very irritable and would soon get mad if the child does not stop crying
data.long_motivation: I know I have a short temper but do not want people to have that perception of me over time, so I try to avoid things that might get me angry

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give food to child to placate him

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go away from the child if he does not stop crying

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get mad if child still does not stop crying
